con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.v6.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Requests">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:ProcessCreditCard>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${#Project#MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr:Password>${#Project#Password}</acr:Password>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr:UserId>${#Project#UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:Amount/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:AuthorizationNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:CardExpirationDate/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:CardLastFourDigits/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:CardNumber/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:CardVerificationNumber/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:CardholderVerificationMethod xsi:nil="true"/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:CurrencyCode>?</acr2:CurrencyCode>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:CustomerBillingAddress/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:CustomerCity xsi:nil="true"/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:CustomerCode/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>?</acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:CustomerPhone xsi:nil="true"/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:CustomerState xsi:nil="true"/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:CustomerZipCode/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:InvoiceDetail xsi:nil="true"/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:InvoiceNumber/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:KeySerialNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:MagneticData/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:NameOnCard/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:Pin xsi:nil="true"/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:PurchaseOrderNumber>?</acr2:PurchaseOrderNumber>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:ReferenceNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:SecureCode>?</acr2:SecureCode>\r <acr2:TaxAmount>${#Project#TaxAmount}</acr2:TaxAmount>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:TerminalCapabilities>?</acr2:TerminalCapabilities>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:TransactionType/>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:ProcessCreditCard>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
